/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a canopy of greenery and architecture. Power lines crisscross above, adding a touch of urbanity to the scene. Cars and people can be seen on the street, adding life and movement to the image. The sun shines brightly in the background, casting a warm glow over the scene and highlighting the vibrant colors of the cityscape.
